name: ASCII adventures
description:
spent the first 2 days on the render engine, the game is much shorter than it could be

if chests constantly spawn move left or right atleast once it will fix it

a,w,d to move

c to parry

q,e to look around

once downloaded run Main.exe to start imma kill someone (for legal reasons thats a joke) if this compile is still over 1gb

..... its still 2 gb

try enabling prune repos?

ERROR :(

try reinstalling electron packer? !?!?!?!??!?!?!

try npm install --dev?

maybe dev dependancys arnt installed some how?

hype!!>>!>! it compiled

5gb

left over code too big?

183mb?????

took out style.css :(

recompiled: HYPE

pretending to orginise files

pasting .5gb into the main folder

???????

unpack zip and run: "Main.exe" to play

go left or right to fix chest bug

check out demo, or demoV2 to see the render engine's capabilities (the main thing that i made, (game was made in 12hours, sorry :( got distracted with cool idea.))
only 1/3 of a GB ez moeny

NOTE: darkmode has been added, it makes the program look far worse and is for debug, it sets the background to grey, the program renders in darkness thus this makes it look much darker and worse, don't use it unless debug or somthing, its there cus im not recompiling this.

Windows only, if you realy need anything else, ask and i will add one, but not right now.
